name: It's Below
description:
It's Below... you hear it approaching in the darkness. Climb! Climb as fast as you can!

Controls:

It's Below can be played with either the Keyboard or a Game pad.

Keyboard:

Movement: A - Move Left | D - Move Right | SPACE - Jump
E - Interact... tap to break fire pot... hold to release a cocooned person.

Game Pad:

Movement: D-Pad to move left and right | (A) button - Jump
(X) Button to interact... press to break fire pot... hold to release a cocooned person.

IMPORTANT NOTE:

It's Below has been tested on Linux and Window (via WINE) and are known to be working (on my computer, at least). I have no way to test the MacOS release and, as such, have not been able to verify it works.

I've had good luck in the past with people reporting that Godot's MacOS exports for my games have worked, but I cannot test this myself.

Information:

It's Below was made for the JamOween 3 game jam using the Godot 3.5.1 Game Engine over the course of 7 days.

Female cocooned person sound effects by Amoreena

Game Music: Dark Ambience Loop
By: Iwan Gabovitch
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

It's Below has it's source code available on Github for anyone interested!
